column2: "Hey, dude! I heard you been busy!"
"Must've been, like, rough when everyone thought you sold us out."
"Well not me! I like, trusted you the whole time man!"
"But like, dontcha think you're goin' overboard, dude?"
"We might be on this BIG mission to exterminate Darkers, but like, you gotta get some R&R in too, y'know?"
"That Ulc babe has been givin' the ship a total makeover, yeah? You miss the party, your loss dude!"
"Especially that Casino! I tell ya, it's one heck of an place! I always lose track of the time."
"Y'know how they say it's important to take a load off, but man... it's addictive. Totally."
"Seriously dude, you better take it easy sometimes! There's more to life than missions."
